name: SCNAudioPlayer
desc: A controller for playback of a positional audio source in a SceneKit scene.

items.name: init(source: SCNAudioSource)
items.desc: Initializes an audio player for playing the specified simple audio source.

items.name: init(avAudioNode: AVAudioNode)
items.desc: Initializes an audio player for playing the specified AVFoundation audio node.

items.name: var audioSource: SCNAudioSource?
items.desc: The source of audio played by this player.

items.name: var audioNode: AVAudioNode?
items.desc: The audio node SceneKit uses for mixing audio from this player.

items.name: var willStartPlayback: (() -> Void)?
items.desc: A block called by SceneKit when playback of the player’s audio source is about to begin.

items.name: var didFinishPlayback: (() -> Void)?
items.desc: A block called by SceneKit when playback of the player’s audio source has completed.
